string.text: Near the Zaton Ranger Station on a roof. Walk the pipes to get there.
Inside a chimney within the Burnt Farmstead.
Hidden on top of the Skadovsk.
On the giant crane. Use the anomaly on top of that rusty ship where that looney Stalker and his mutant dog live...hehe.
The roof of the gas station in Zaton.
Behind a building near the Waste Processing Station.
Behind a building near the Waste Processing Station.
East of the Preobrazhensky bridge, hidden in some bushes.
North of the Burnt Farmstead behind some rocks.
